meanings.definition: A circle of light appearing to surround the sun or moon
meanings.sent1: The halos around the sun looked like glowing rings in the sky.
meanings.sent2: People often notice halos around the moon on clear nights.
meanings.sent3: The halos around the sun seemed to play hide and seek with the clouds.
meanings.sent4: The halos around the moon were like celestial crowns in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The halos around the sun created a magical aura in the heavens.

meanings.definition: A circle of light shown around the head of a holy person in religious art
meanings.sent1: The artist painted halos around the heads of the saints in the church mural.
meanings.sent2: In religious paintings, halos symbolize divine presence around holy figures.
meanings.sent3: The halos in the artwork made the saints look like they had glowing hats.
meanings.sent4: The halos around the holy figures seemed to illuminate the entire painting.
meanings.sent5: The golden halos around the heads of the saints added a heavenly touch to the artwork.

meanings.definition: A circle of light or brightness surrounding an object
meanings.sent1: The halos around the streetlights made the night feel cozy and warm.
meanings.sent2: The halos around the car headlights illuminated the foggy road ahead.
meanings.sent3: The halos around the lamp posts gave the city a magical glow at night.
meanings.sent4: The halos around the candles flickered softly in the dark room.
meanings.sent5: The halos around the fireflies danced like tiny lanterns in the garden.
